siteDescription: DPX Public Sale will be live on 21st June

introduction.title: Dopex Public Sale
introduction.paragraph: The Dopex Public Sale concluded on June 24th, 2021.

body.description: Familiarize yourself with the sale with these simple pointers.

0.heading: Date & Supply
0.paragraph: Total of 75,000 DPX (15% of total supply) will be available in exchange for ETH via the deposit contract.

1.heading: Deposit Contract
1.paragraph: The contract accepts deposits until DPX reaches its max price or the sale concludes by June 24th, 2021.

2.heading: Fair Distribution
2.paragraph: Claimable DPX will be based on their share of total deposits at the end. In other words, there is no front-running and being first or last doesnâ€™t matter.

3.heading: Sale Distribution
3.helperText: The sale follows a linear graph that determines the final token price for every participant.

4.heading: DPX Emission and Allocation
4.helperText: The token sale allocation above is a sum of the public sale and early investors allocation.

faq.paragraph: We enjoy answering your questions in person when possible but please check our FAQ below before pinging our team on Discord

0.question: Will it be a classic token sale (first come, first served)?
0.answer: Yes. Users can deposit ETH until a max cap or deadline is reached.

1.question: Are any countries excluded from the public token sale?
1.answer: All OFAC sanctioned countries are excluded (including US).

2.question: Where can I read more on Tokenomics (lock-up, emission schedule, etc.)?
2.answer: You can read everything about our tokenomics in our documentation here - https://docs.dopex.io/tokenomics
